channel.title: Egyptian hieroglyphs crossword puzzle
channel.description: ok i have to create a crossword puzzle with information about egypt. The hard thing is that the clues have to be in hieroglyphic format but the awnswers can be translated into english. The crossword puzzle must have utilize terms and information about Egypt. I must have a minimum of 8 clues. Some good examples or terms and information about egypt can be helpful.
